import React from "react"; import { Card, CardHeader, CardBody, CardTitle, Row, Col } from "reactstrap"; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; // core components_chart 입력하는 부분_ // 아래에 차트 이름과, 차트 경로를 입력하면 된다. import { chartExample2, chartExample4 } from "../../variables/charts.js"; import chartData from "../../variables/charts.js"; import ReactFC from 'react-fusioncharts'; import ReactFusioncharts from "react-fusioncharts"; import FusionCharts from 'fusioncharts'; import charts from 'fusioncharts/fusioncharts.charts'; import Zoomline from "fusioncharts/fusioncharts.zoomline"; import FusionTheme from 'fusioncharts/themes/fusioncharts.theme.fusion'; import { Script } from "vm"; ReactFC.fcRoot(FusionCharts, charts, Zoomline, FusionTheme); charts(FusionCharts); let dataSource = new Array(); let url = [ "http://bcmon.kmu.ac.kr/bitcoin/graphs/number-of-transaction/sum/month", "http://bcmon.kmu.ac.kr/bitcoin/graphs/number-of-transaction/average/month", "http://bcmon.kmu.ac.kr/bitcoin/graphs/transaction/total/month", "http://bcmon.kmu.ac.kr/bitcoin/graphs/total-output/value/month", "http://bcmon.kmu.ac.kr/bitcoin/graphs/utxo-count/value/month", "http://bcmon.kmu.ac.kr/bitcoin/graphs/nUtxo/total/month", "http://bcmon.kmu.ac.kr/bitcoin/graphs/cost-of-tx-volume/value/month", "http://bcmon.kmu.ac.kr/bitcoin/graphs/cost-per-tx/value/month", "http://bcmon.kmu.ac.kr/bitcoin/graphs/total-fee/value/month" ]; var tag = [ "sum_nTx_per_day", "avg_nTx_per_day", "accumulated_nTx_per_day", "totalOutput", "nUtxo", "accumulated_nUtxo_per_day", "costOfTxVolume", "costPerTx", "value" ]; var title = [ "Sum of TX per Day", "Average of TX per Day", "Total TX per Day", "Total Output of value", "Count of Daily UTXO", "Total UTXO per Day", "Cost of TX Volume", "Cost per TX", "Total Fee" ]; var caption = [ "Sum of daily transactions in bitcoin network.", "Average of daily transactions in bitcoin network.", "Total transactions until now in bitcoin network.", "Total output of transactions value in bitcoin network.", "Count of utxo per day in bitcoin network.", "Total utxo per day in bitcoin network.", "Cost of each transactions volume in bitcoin network.", "Cost of each transactions in bitcoin network.", "Total fee for transactions in bitcoin network." ]; class bitcoinTx extends React.Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.state = { bigChartData: "data1", //mean은 그래프 당 의미가 하나 밖에 없을 때는 사용하지 말것. mean:"Sum of Tx" }; } // 버튼 사용시 사용하는 생성자 setBgChartData = (name1, name2) => { this.setState({ bigChartData: name1, mean: name2 }); }; render() { for(var i = 0; i < url.length; i++) { dataSource[i] = chartData.renderGraph(url[i], tag[i], title[i], caption[i], i); console.log("임시 데이터 1 - " + i + " : "); console.log(JSON.stringify(dataSource[i])); } return ( <>

Transaction

.

); } } export default bitcoinTx;
